channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Efficient Streaming Language Models with Attention Sinks
item.description: In this paper, we first demonstrate that the emergence of attention sink is due to the strong attention scores towards initial tokens as a ``sink'' even if they are not semantically important.

item.title: DreamGaussian: Generative Gaussian Splatting for Efficient 3D Content Creation
item.description: In contrast to the occupancy pruning used in Neural Radiance Fields, we demonstrate that the progressive densification of 3D Gaussians converges significantly faster for 3D generative tasks.

item.title: Demystifying CLIP Data
item.description: We believe that the main ingredient to the success of CLIP is its data and not the model architecture or pre-training objective.

item.title: Text-to-3D using Gaussian Splatting
item.description: In this stage, we increase the number of Gaussians by compactness-based densification to enhance continuity and improve fidelity.

item.title: ToRA: A Tool-Integrated Reasoning Agent for Mathematical Problem Solving
item.description: Large language models have made significant progress in various language tasks, yet they still struggle with complex mathematics.

item.title: Deep Geometrized Cartoon Line Inbetweening
item.description: To preserve the precision and detail of the line drawings, we propose a new approach, AnimeInbet, which geometrizes raster line drawings into graphs of endpoints and reframes the inbetweening task as a graph fusion problem with vertex repositioning.

item.title: ProPainter: Improving Propagation and Transformer for Video Inpainting
item.description: We also propose a mask-guided sparse video Transformer, which achieves high efficiency by discarding unnecessary and redundant tokens.

item.title: Boolformer: Symbolic Regression of Logic Functions with Transformers
item.description: In this work, we introduce Boolformer, the first Transformer architecture trained to perform end-to-end symbolic regression of Boolean functions.

item.title: Break-A-Scene: Extracting Multiple Concepts from a Single Image
item.description: Text-to-image model personalization aims to introduce a user-provided concept to the model, allowing its synthesis in diverse contexts.

item.title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for Real-Time Radiance Field Rendering
item.description: Radiance Field methods have recently revolutionized novel-view synthesis of scenes captured with multiple photos or videos.

item.title: QA-LoRA: Quantization-Aware Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models
item.description: Recently years have witnessed a rapid development of large language models (LLMs).

item.title: BayesDLL: Bayesian Deep Learning Library
item.description: We release a new Bayesian neural network library for PyTorch for large-scale deep networks.

item.title: LongLoRA: Efficient Fine-tuning of Long-Context Large Language Models
item.description: LongLoRA adopts LLaMA2 7B from 4k context to 100k, or LLaMA2 70B to 32k on a single 8x A100 machine.

item.title: 3D Implicit Transporter for Temporally Consistent Keypoint Discovery
item.description: To address this issue, the Transporter method was introduced for 2D data, which reconstructs the target frame from the source frame to incorporate both spatial and temporal information.

item.title: Towards Explainable 3D Grounded Visual Question Answering: A New Benchmark and Strong Baseline
item.description: We also propose a new 3D VQA framework to effectively predict the completely visually grounded and explainable answer.

item.title: InstructCV: Instruction-Tuned Text-to-Image Diffusion Models as Vision Generalists
item.description: We then use a large language model to paraphrase prompt templates that convey the specific tasks to be conducted on each image, and through this process, we create a multi-modal and multi-task training dataset comprising input and output images along with annotated instructions.

item.title: Simple Online and Realtime Tracking
item.description: This paper explores a pragmatic approach to multiple object tracking where the main focus is to associate objects efficiently for online and realtime applications.

item.title: Training a Large Video Model on a Single Machine in a Day
item.description: Videos are big, complex to pre-process, and slow to train on.

item.title: Demonstrate-Search-Predict: Composing retrieval and language models for knowledge-intensive NLP
item.description: Retrieval-augmented in-context learning has emerged as a powerful approach for addressing knowledge-intensive tasks using frozen language models (LM) and retrieval models (RM).

item.title: Cost-Effective Hyperparameter Optimization for Large Language Model Generation Inference
item.description: Large Language Models (LLMs) have sparked significant interest in their generative capabilities, leading to the development of various commercial applications.
